sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { RestServiceService } from '../shared/rest-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-surgery', templateUrl: './add-surgery.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-surgery.component.css'] }) export class AddSurgeryComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(public objService: RestServiceService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.resetForm(); } resetForm(form?: NgForm) { if (form != null) { form.form.reset(); } else { this.objService.SurgeryData = { SurgeryId: 0, DoctorId:0,SurgeryDate:new Date(),StartTime:0,EndTime:0,SurgeryCategory:'' }; } } onSubmit(form: NgForm) { if (this.objService.SurgeryData.SurgeryId == 0) { this.insertRecord(form); } } insertRecord(form: NgForm) { this.objService.addSurgery().subscribe( (res) => { this.resetForm(form); this.objService.getAllSurgery(); alert('Surgery Successfully Added!!'); }, (err) => { alert('Error!!' + err); } ); } }

Add New Surgery

All fields are mandatory

Start Time is required.
End Time is required.
Cancel
